channel.title: More Social Media Suggestions for Spreading Whonix
channel.description:
Hi,
Just want to ask for help if possible from everyone who has used and experienced social media.
which one do u recommend more to use in ur opinion?
we have at the moment the following accounts:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Official_Whonix_Online_Profiles

item.title: More Social Media Suggestions for Spreading Whonix

item.description:
@TNT_BOM_BOM will be Whonix community manager focusing on outreach.
